TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UserControlControlBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder

Docs.summary: Supports the ASP.NET page parser in building an instance of a user control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks By default, every user control on a page is associated with a default UserControlControlBuilder class. Page developers do not use the UserControlControlBuilder class directly. User control authors might create custom user control builder functionality by extending this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object BuildObject() cil managed

Docs.summary: Builds an instance of the control identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ControlType%2A> property.
Docs.returns: An instance of a user control identified by <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ControlType%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool NeedsTagInnerText() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the control builder needs to get the control's inner text.
Docs.returns: if the control builder requires the control's inner text; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the NeedsTagInnerText method returns `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControlControlBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A> method is called. When the control is built in a designer environment, the NeedsTagInnerText property returns `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetTagInnerText(string text) cil managed

Docs.summary: Provides the object with the inner text of the control tag.
